name: MegaGlest
description: MegaGlest is a 3d real time strategy game with a very strong AI. Single player games and especially multiplayer co-op games are much fun. The game already has a lot of content and it is very easy to make new content, especially new maps.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel core i3 3217U, AMD Athlon X4 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 250, Intel 5200, Radeon HD 4850 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) Processor: Intel core i5, AMD Phenom II x4 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 650ti, AMD HD 7850 Storage: 700 MB available space
